short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that automatically refreshes a tab on a fully customizable interval. Free from any nefarious API calls or activity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Basic Auto Refresh Extension- forked from: https://github.com/VastBlast/CustomAutoRefresh

All credit goes to developer: VastBlast

We needed a basic auto refresh tool that is free from any unwanted API calls or activity - by forking from this repo we can lock it in this safe state for future use
